 Training Sessions 
 Are you looking for the perfect location for a training session? The Olympic Park is home to a number of rooms that can accommodate small or large groups. The auditorium, located in the Tower, is known for its practical amenities and its cutting-edge audiovisual and multimedia equipment. Simply choose the area that best suits your needs!
